entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
